thread.title: The many reactions when 'Moonlight' surprise won best picture at the Academy Awards
thread.title_full: The many reactions when 'Moonlight' surprise won best picture at the Academy Awards

author: Jessica Roy
title: The many reactions when 'Moonlight' surprise won best picture at the Academy Awards
text:
Feb. 27, 2017, 6:10 p.m. The many reactions when 'Moonlight' surprise won best picture at the Academy Awards Matt Damon seemingly cannot contain his disbelief at the turnaround. (Al Seib / Los Angeles Times) 
It was a wild night at the Oscars. 
If this is your first time looking at the Internet since yesterday, here's the short version of what you missed: Warren Beatty and Faye Dunaway were handed the wrong card and erroneously announced "La La Land" had won best picture when, in fact, "Moonlight" had won that honor. Here's the long version of what happened . 
The Times photographer Al Seib was backstage at the exact moment the crowd learned that there had been a mistake. This is what it looked like. (Al Seib / Los Angeles Times) Meryl Streep, right, and Dwayne Johnson react with arched eyebrows. Sitting behind the Rock is motion picture academy President Cheryl Boone Isaacs. (Al Seib / Los Angeles Times) David Oyelowo, center, takes in the events. (Al Seib / Los Angeles Times) Jaden Piner of "Moonlight" takes the stage. (Al Seib / Los Angeles Times) Busy Philips clutches her perfectly manicured nails as the 'Moonlight' cast and crew give their thank you speech. (Al Seib / Los Angeles Times)
